Description: This publication contains data taken from the Adult Social Care Fice Return (ASC-FR) and Short and Long Term (SALT) collection to provide information regarding adult social care activity and fice on local authorities in England for 2018-19.
Name: Adult Social Care Activity and Fice Report, England
Sizing Notes: Simple table structures. Large number of tables, not all same structure. Multiple dimensions and sub dimensions, several footnotes.
